channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump’s Tariffs Are Threatening America’s Apple Juice Supply Chain
item.description: Most of the apple juice Americans drink is imported, with a large share coming from China. Experts say families should expect to start paying higher p...

item.title: Pro-Ject Flatten It Review: Finally, a Way to Fix Warped Records
item.description: Own a pile of warped records that you love? This gentle heating machine can help you make them play well again.

item.title: Microsoft Surface Pro (12 Inch) and Surface Laptop (13 Inch): Specs, Price, Features, Release Date
item.description: The Surface Laptop and Surface Pro are lighter and thinner, with pared-down specs, but the 2024 models are better and available for the same prices, i...

item.title: How to Use Your Smartphone to Cope With Hearing Loss (2025): Tips for iPhone, Android
item.description: From live transcriptions to sound filtering, here’s how you can benefit from features on Android and Apple devices.

item.title: Smeg Soda Maker SKC01 Review: Beauty and Bubbles
item.description: Bring some Italian style to your acqua frizzante, even if it is made out of plastic.
